titleStmt.title: The metamorphosis of Pigmalions image And certaine satyres.
titleStmt.author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Iames Roberts] for Edmond Matts, & are to be sold at the signe of the hand and Plough in Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last two leaves are blank.
